Our in-house catering, led by the chefs at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails, features globally influenced Southern cuisine and handcrafted cocktails that showcase the freshest ingredients of Northern Florida. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a grand banquet, we’ll create a custom menu tailored to your vision. Contact the Sales Department for more information. Host Meetings at Hotel ELEO – Elegant Gainesville Event Space FAQs Gift Card Patients Gallery Contact Us 352-565-3750 Book Now Accommodations Accommodations Amenities Accessibility Pet-Friendly Stays Offers Dining Dining Menus Events Reservations Meetings & Events Meetings & Events Venues Services Gather + Celebrate Catering + Banquets Start Planning Weddings Weddings Start Planning Things To Do Things To Do Nearby Attractions Arts & Entertainment Eco Adventure Sports Event Calendar Blogs Book Now 352-565-3750 Menu Previous Next Item 1 Host a Successful Event Gainesville Meetings & Events Inspired by the innovative spirit of UF Health and downtown Gainesville, Hotel ELEO offers 1,100 sq. ft. of contemporary event space, perfect for sophisticated business events and social gatherings. Our elegant venues are ideal for corporate retreats, luncheons, and dinners, ensuring every detail is flawless and every experience rewarding. Bring your vision to life with us. The experience is further enhanced with an additional 2,000 sq. ft of outdoor patio space surrounded by the beautiful Rush Lake, radiating a sense of calm and peace of mind. Meeting & Event Venues Stylish in design and captivating indoor/outdoor venues are perfect for your intimate meeting and events in Gainesville, Florida. From selecting a venue to designing incredible menus and décor, we help you plan and host the tailor-made event of your dream. Learn More Start Planning Custom Event Services Host an inspiring meeting or a private event in versatile venues with exceptional services, from custom catering to modern décor, audiovisual, group accommodations, and event planning. Learn More Start Planning Event Catering Incredible cuisine and casually elegant culinary experiences are at the heart of events at Hotel ELEO at the University of Florida. The chefs at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails will craft a custom menu of globally influenced Southern cuisine and cocktails made from the freshest ingredients of Northern Florida. Learn More Start Planning Event Planning in Gainesville Whether you plan for a corporate meeting or private event like a bridal shower, rehearsal dinner, or a stunning lakeside reception, our sales staff will help you create extraordinary moments in the heart of Gainesville, Fl. Start Planning Amenities 1,100 sq. ft. of Meeting & Event Space U-Shape, Classroom, Banquet Configurations Complimentary High-speed Wi-Fi Indoor & Outdoor Space Catered Meals Complimentary Valet Parking Frequently Asked Questions Can We Reserve Room Blocks for Our Meeting and Event Guests? Yes. Hotel ELEO offers beautifully designed rooms and suites with city and lake views for your event guests. Whether you host your event at one of the nearby venues in Gainesville, you can reserve a block of rooms with special rates for your event. For event planning and group accommodations, request a proposal. How Do You Find an Event Venue in Gainesville? Finding the perfect event venue comes down to personal style and vision. Whether looking for an elegant indoor/ outdoor venue or a lakeside patio. We recommend choosing a venue that matches your vision, guest list size, and budget. Consider what the space includes, like catering and audiovisual, and its location for traveling guests. The event planners at Hotel ELEO can share their tips and work with you to create your intimate meeting or celebration, from selecting the venue to designing your menu. What Makes a Good Event Venue? Your event space sets the tone for your meeting and events, so choosing the right venue for your style and individuality is imperative. Many elements make up a good event venue , including: Availability for the event dates you desire Size of the venue to match your guest list Flexibility of the venue for multiple events Location near airports and accommodations Style that matches your personality and vision Transportation and parking Catering menus and custom culinary experiences Event packages that include catering, bar, and staffing Cost that fits your budget Does Hotel Eleo Offer Catering? Hotel ELEO offers creative catering and packages for special events, from brunches to dinner banquets to cocktail parties. Chef Andy Niedenthal and Covey Kitchen + Cocktails create modern southern cuisine with global influences and signature cocktails for wedding receptions and celebrations. Julia Collins Student Contributor, University of Florida This article is written by a student writer from the Spoon University at UFL chapter and does not reflect the views of Spoon University. Tucked away under the Hotel Eleo, Covey Kitchen + Cocktails is a delightful getaway for both you and your tastebuds. It’s located at 1514 SW 14th St, Gainesville with valet-only parking (but don’t worry, the valet is free). The floor to ceiling glass windows that wrapped around the outer edge of the eatery give way to the fountain outside. They’re open from 7 am to 9 pm, their brunch hours are also 10 am to 2 pm, and the bar is open from 7 am to 10 pm. *Disclaimer: Covey Kitchen + Cocktails graciously invited and treated us to this dinner. Victoria Vargas Drinks Victoria Vargas The drinks at Covey were unique and delicious. The three we tried were Strawberry Fields, Gin + Matcha and Butterfly Effect. Strawberry Fields was light and refreshing but definitely on the stronger side. The Gin + Matcha was an interesting mix none of us had come across before. If you’re a matcha lover then you’ll be a fan of this drink. Finally, the Butterfly Effect had butterfly pea flower infused blackthorn gin, lemon, lavender simple syrup and egg whites in it, creating an interesting combination of flavors. The consensus was that the Strawberry Fields was the favorite we tried. All the cocktails on their menu cost between $12-$14, and they also had a wine and beer menu that we didn’t dip into. Appetizers Victoria Vargas The appetizer selection (called Shareables) was expansive but not overwhelming — my favorite type of menu. We had the Crispy Cauliflower (pictured above), the Wings, Charcuterie + Cheese and the Avocado Toast. The cauliflower was cooked well and the sauces brought with it to dip were amazing (the chipotle one was my favorite). The chicken wings were a bit plain but the meat was cooked very nicely and they came with the same three sauces as the cauliflower. The charcuterie board was delectable, featuring three types of cheeses, three kinds of meat, olives, some bread and some spreads. My personal favorite appetizer, however, had to be the avocado toast. Normally a brunch food, their avocado toast as a starter was a genius move. It came with buttered pieces of toast, and the avocado was in a mound underneath a mountain of greens. I liked the crunch the greens added to the experience, and it was the creamiest avocado I’ve had. Victoria Vargas Entrees Victoria Vargas Myself, our marketing director Darya, our photography director Tori and our events director Enrique all attended this dinner, so we each ordered a different entree. Between us, we got Scallops, Salmon Nicoise, Steak Frites and Fried Chicken. About the fried chicken, Darya said, “How is it crispy and juicy? Explain the physics.” All the entrees were well-prepared and the portions were the perfect size. I would recommend the Fried Chicken the most. Victoria Vargas Pictured above is the Scallops on a bed of creamy risotto topped with greens and plated with mushrooms. Below are the Steak Frites that came with a side salad and well-seasoned fries. Victoria Vargas Dessert Victoria Vargas At the end of our meal we were surprised with four desserts that weren’t on the menu: Bread Pudding, Banana Pudding, Citrus Pie and Belgian Mousse. None of the desserts were too heavy or filling; they were light and the perfect cap to the meal. I would recommend getting one and splitting it, though, as they’re fun to share. Atmosphere Victoria Vargas “This is where you’d want to get taken on a date,” Darya said. “Or graduation dinner.” The Covey Kitchen + Cocktails atmosphere was unlike any I’ve come across in Gainesville before. It was sleek, elegant and polished. As Darya said, it’s the perfect place to go out for a nice meal. Dinner Drinks Graduation Kitchen Wine Julia Collins UFL '21 Hey guys! I'm Julia & I'm a first year masters student here at UF. I served as Editorial Director for Spoon UF for two years, and I now am the Managing Editor. Coffee is my love language, so I tend to write about it a lot. Follow Us Good stuff only! Hungry for more? We strive to handle customer complaints promptly and fairly. Contacting Us If you're unhappy with something, the fastest way to reach us is through our online chat service. Alternatively, you can write to us at our registered address: Complaints Team Wickes Building Supplies Limited Vision House 19 Colonial Way Watford WD24 4JL To help us respond to you as quickly as possible, please include: Your name and address A contact phone number and email Your order number Details of your complaint with supporting photos Actions you’d like us to consider In the event that the customer services team is unable to resolve your complaint, or if you’re unhappy with the outcome, you can escalate your complaint by emailing customer.relations@wickes.co.uk , who will acknowledge your complaint within 48 hours and send it to the appropriate team. Resolution We aim to resolve your complaint at the first point of contact. Once the investigation is complete, you will be informed of the outcome. If you remain unhappy with the outcome, you can refer the decision to The Furniture and Home Improvement Ombudsman . They will review your case and may request further information from you or from us. Their decision will be binding upon us. For more information, visit fhio.org . Complaints relating to financial agreements If your complaint relates to the lender, it will be forwarded to them within five days of receipt. We will inform you once it has been sent. If the complaint is partially about the lender's actions, that part will be sent to the lender to investigate, while we will investigate the part related to the sale of the financial product and service. We will conduct a thorough and independent investigation and agree on a suitable outcome with you. Once our investigation is complete, we will inform you of the outcome. If you’re unhappy with the outcome, you can refer your complaint to the Financial Ombudsman Service . Frequently Asked Questions | Hotel ELEO Gainesville FAQs Gift Card Patients Gallery Contact Us 352-565-3750 Book Now Accommodations Accommodations Amenities Accessibility Pet-Friendly Stays Offers Dining Dining Menus Events Reservations Meetings & Events Meetings & Events Venues Services Gather + Celebrate Catering + Banquets Start Planning Weddings Weddings Start Planning Things To Do Things To Do Nearby Attractions Arts & Entertainment Eco Adventure Sports Event Calendar Blogs Book Now 352-565-3750 Menu Previous Next Item 1 Frequently Asked Questions Our Hotel Where is Hotel ELEO located? Our upscale hotel is located near the expansive University of Florida campus and within minutes of the University of Florida Health Hospital and UF Health medical network in Gainesville, Florida. Do you offer a shuttle? Yes, we offer complimentary shuttle services to select UF Health facilities. See our Patients section for more information. Are pets allowed at Hotel ELEO? Hotel ELEO is a pet-friendly stay welcoming dogs. There is a $50 non-refundable fee per stay, per dog. For full details, including guidelines and exceptions for patient reservations, please view our Pet Policy . What time is Check-in / Check-out at Hotel ELEO? Check-in is any time after 4 PM and check-out time is 11 AM. You may request early check-in or late check-out when booking, subject to availability. Contact us to start planning your getaway to Gainesville, FL. Does Hotel Eleo have a fitness center? The hotel offers a complimentary fitness center, open seven days a week, 24 hours a day. The fitness center provides cardio and weight training equipment for a total body workout. Does Hotel Eleo offer accessible rooms? The hotel offers accessible rooms, meeting spaces, and common areas for guests with disabilities. For more information about the physical features of our accessible rooms, common areas or special services, call (352)565-3750. Is valet parking available at Hotel Eleo? Yes, Hotel ELEO offers valet parking for guests at a rate of $25 per night, available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Guests booking under the Patient, UF Health, or UF Faculty rates receive complimentary valet service. Dining guests at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails also enjoy complimentary valet. Is transportation available to the University of Florida? Our hotel is conveniently located within walking distance of the University of Florida, just 0.4 miles away. Enjoy the convenience of a short stroll to the university's campus from our hotel. Does Hotel Eleo Offer Seasonal Specials? Yes, Hotel ELEO offers seasonal specials and packages that change throughout the year, including discounts on our hotel’s best available rates, exclusive perks, and extras. The hotel also offers special rates for Florida residents with a valid ID. View specials How far is the nearest hospital from Hotel Eleo? Hospitals are at easy access from our Hotel Eleo in Gainesville. Just within walking distance of our hotel. Is transportation available to the hospital from the hotel? Yes, we offer transportation services to close by hospitals. You can request transportation through our front desk or concierge. Where does the name Hotel ELEO originate? The hotel is named after the Goddess of Compassion. In ancient Athens, ELEOs (Ancient Greek Ἔλεος m.) was the personification of pity, mercy, clemency, and compassion. Compassion is part of the hotel's culture. Dining When is Covey Kitchen + Cocktails open? Our on-site dining restaurant, Covey Kitchen + Cocktails in Gainesville is open daily from 7 AM to 11 PM. Browse our menu featuring dinner, lunch, weekend brunch, and breakfast options, focusing on American cuisine with global influences. Our restaurant also features live jazz every Wednesday from 6 to 8 pm. Food Hours : 7 AM to 9 PM Bar hours from Sunday to Monday : 7 AM to 11 PM Valet parking is complimentary for Covey Kitchen + Cocktails visitors Does the Restaurant Take Reservations? Yes, we offer convenient reservations to our restaurant through OpenTable. Learn more and make your reservation here . Does Covey Kitchen + Cocktails serve coffee? Yes, we have a coffee shop in Covey Kitchen + Cocktails in Gainesville. Does Covey Kitchen + Cocktails offer takeout? Yes. Covey Kitchen + Cocktails does offer takeout for all menu items. Does Hotel ELEO have room service? Our Gainesville hotel does not have an in-room dining service. We do have our Gather + Go market, which is available 24/7 for all guests. What kind of food is at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails? Covey Kitchen + Cocktails serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner seven days a week, crafted by our talented culinary team. The menu changes seasonally, with selections using locally sourced ingredients. Does Covey Kitchen + Cocktails have a bar? Yes. Covey Kitchen + Cocktails has a full-service bar with an impressive wine list, irresistible craft cocktails, and local craft brews. Bar hours from Sunday to Monday : 7 AM to 11 PM Is there outdoor dining space at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails? Yes. Covey Kitchen + Cocktails offers a spacious outdoor dining terrace and other outdoor venues available for catered events. Contact us to make your table reservations. Does Hotel ELEO have catering? Hotel ELEO offers creative catering and packages for special events, from brunches to dinner banquets to cocktail parties. Our Chef and Covey Kitchen + Cocktails create modern southern cuisine with global influences and signature cocktails for wedding receptions and celebrations. Does Covey Kitchen + Cocktails offer brunch? Yes, we offer brunch on Saturday and Sunday mornings from 11 AM to 2 PM. Explore our brunch menu and reserve your table now. Do you accommodate special dietary requests? Yes. Please get in touch with us directly at 352-565-3712 with your dietary needs. Our Cleanliness Commitment What is your stay over clean policy at Hotel Eleo? We provide daily stay-over cleaning to ensure your room remains fresh and comfortable throughout your stay. Additionally, if you need any extra hotel amenities during your visit, our team is more than happy to bring them to your room upon request. Do you take any additional cleaning measures for patients or medical travelers? Yes, Hotel ELEO takes extra steps to support the needs of medical travelers by offering PURE Rooms. These rooms are specially designed to provide enhanced cleanliness and air purity, creating a safe environment for guests with health concerns or anyone seeking a fresher, cleaner stay. PURE Rooms go beyond standard hotel cleaning practices. Equipped with an advanced air filtration system, they remove airborne particles to reduce allergens, mold, and bacteria, ensuring the highest possible air quality. For patients or visitors coming to UF Health Shands Hospital, these rooms offer a space that prioritizes wellness and supports both physical recovery and peace of mind — especially reassuring for guests recovering from medical procedures or those with respiratory sensitivities. Do you provide hand sanitizer to guests? Yes, guest accessible disinfecting wipes and sanitizer are available at entrances and all high-traffic areas. AccessIbility Do you offer accessible rooms? Yes, Hotel ELEO offers accessible rooms. For more information, please visit the link below Accommodations Do you have rooms with roll-in showers? Yes, we have roll-in showers in the king-accessible room. If you have any specific accessibility requests, please contact us using the information on the reservation confirmation received after making your hotel booking. Do you have rooms for the hearing-impaired? Yes, we have hearing-impaired guestrooms with two queen beds with TTY equipment available on request. Contact our staff for any information on accessible guest room features. Do you have accessible rooms with bathtubs? Yes. Our King ADA Guestroom has either a walk-in shower or a tub/shower combination with handrails. Explore the accessible room features and plan your stay in our Gainesville hotel at the University of Florida. Location What are the top attractions near Hotel ELEO? Hotel ELEO is located near top local attractions in Gainesville, including Ben Hill Griffin Stadium, Florida Museum of Natural History, University of Florida Bat Houses, and Thomas Center. How far is Hotel ELEO from downtown Gainesville? Downtown Gainesville is only 1.7 miles away from Hotel ELEO. Book your stay with us and explore the vibrant town featuring shops, restaurants, theatres, and parks. How far is Hotel ELEO from the University of Florida? Hotel ELEO is located inside the UF campus and adjacent to the UF Health Complex in Gainesville. Our upscale hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the UF Health Neuromedicine Hospital and a 15-minute stroll from UF Health Shands Hospital. What are the best things to do in downtown Gainesville? The bustling Gainesville downtown offers plenty of things, including boutique stores, famous restaurants, and vibrant nightlife. Get the best local experience with music concerts at the Hippodrome theater. Visit art galleries like the Harn Museum of Art and Santa Fe College Art Gallery or explore holiday festivals, dynamic events, and historical landmarks like the Florida Museum of Natural History. What are the best restaurants in Gainesville near Hotel ELEO? Gainesville is known for its unique dining scene and is home to eclectic restaurants, cafes, and eateries, serving authentic local delicacies, comfort food, and international cuisines. Hotel ELEO near the UF campus has an onsite dining option - Covey Kitchen + Cocktails, which recently earned a spot on Yelp's Top 100 Restaurants in the USA. Other restaurants near our hotel include Dragonfly Sushi & Sake, Embers Wood Grill, Paramount Grill, and Mark's Prime Steakhouse. What are the best outdoor activities in Gainesville, FL? Gainesville is famous for landscaped parks, expansive outdoor spaces, and well-maintained gardens. Discover scenic hiking trails, spend an afternoon picnicking with friends and family, and enjoy leisure walks amidst the picturesque setting. Some parks near Hotel ELEO include Depot Park, Payne's Prairie Preserve State Park, and Kanapaha Botanical Gardens. Which is the closest airport to Hotel ELEO? Gainesville Regional Airport is 6.8 miles from Hotel ELEO; it takes approximately 15 minutes to reach. Other airports nearby are Cecil Field NAS Airport, located 57.8 miles away, and Jacksonville International Airport is 82.9 miles away. University of Florida What are the top attractions near the Hotel ELEO University of Florida? Hotel ELEO is located near the top attractions in Gainesville, Florida, like Ben Hill Griffin Stadium, which is only 1.8 miles away, Butterfly Rainforest is just 2.4 miles, Thomas Center is also 2.5 miles away, Depot Park is only 1.8 miles, and Hippodrome Theatre is just 2 miles away from our hotel. There is something for every visitor to Gainesville to see and experience, from art to culture, sports, and entertainment. What are the campus attractions at the University of Florida? The University of Florida, Gainesville, is an incredible architecture with 20 buildings on the National Register of Historic Places. Nearly 2,000 acres of area is just like a movie location. More than 50,000 students from more than 130 countries and all 50 states complete the picture of a campus straight out of central casting. Please visit this link for more information. Where can I stay near the University of Florida? Parents or students can stay at our Hotel ELEO, near the University of Florida. Enjoy modern amenities that make you feel at home from the moment you step inside. What is Gainesville, Florida, known for? Gainesville is known for its preservation of historic buildings and mesmerizing natural surroundings. Being one of the most attractive cities in Florida, the numerous parks, museums, and lakes provide entertainment to thousands of visitors. Patients What are the shuttle hours? The shuttle operating hours are from 7 AM to 10 PM. How do I need to schedule a shuttle service? You can schedule at the front desk or with the valet attendant. What amenities do you offer for patients? We offer upscale amenities for patients' comfortable stay, like shower chairs, ADA room types, luggage assistance, PURE rooms, a shuttle to the main Shands buildings, and microwave. What is the distance from the hospital to our hotel? Our Gainesville hotel is just 0.5 miles away, or 3 minutes walking distance from the hospital. What is the check-in / check-out time? check-in begins at 4 pm, and check-out is at 11 am. Is there a coffee shop nearby? Opus coffee is in the lobby of the UF Health Heart & Vascular Hospital. Do you offer a connecting room? Yes, we do offer connecting rooms. Does the hotel provide rolling beds? No. We do not have Roll away beds. Do you offer a parking facility? Yes. We offer complimentary valet parking only. University of Florida Health Is UF health the same as Shands? The University of Florida Health is a private, not-for-profit hospital affiliated with the University of Florida. The most comprehensive academic health center in the Southeast, with campuses in Gainesville and Jacksonville. Which is the biggest hospital in Gainesville, Florida? The University of Florida Health, a non-profit hospital located in Gainesville, Florida, is one of the biggest and the number one hospital with the finest healthcare facilities. What are the working hours of University of Florida Health? The University of Florida Health in Gainesville is open 24 hours a day to give you a better health facility and the best treatment for fast recovery.
